title: Energy Vortex
text: As Energy Vortex enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.At the beginning of your upkeep, remove all energy counters from Energy Vortex.At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Energy Vortex deals 3 damage to that player unless he or she pays  for each energy counter on Energy Vortex.: Put X energy counters on Energy Vortex. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
